text:
Created attachment 27762
the error page source code

Hello, apache!

   I create a simple page use RadPHP, it get a fatal error in httpd. The function of the page is:
1. Put an input text box in the page.
2. Refresh the page per minute,and write the current datetime to the text box.
(The page source code in attachment: refresh.zip)
the picture of the page:

 When I use two computer access the page in IE at the same time，after a while, a error happend on httpd, a error Window with memory error showed on httpd like this:


If I open two IE in one computer to access the page at the same time, no error happend.

But, I save the source code as a new php in IE, and I use two computer access the page in IE, there is no error report on httpd.

The httpd version is 2.2.21, I tried all the old version, But it have the same error. 

The attachment refresh.zip:
errrefresh.php and errrefresh.xml.php are the error page source code.


apache error.log:

[Wed Sep 28 10:17:57 2011] [notice] Parent: child process exited with status 3221225477 -- Restarting. 
     
------------------------------------
creator: ganlnyn@gmail.com

text: reopen if you have a non PHP testcase, we can't debug the PHP interpreter running inside of httpd.
creator: covener@gmail.com
